sections.text: When I graduated from my multimedia diploma, I had to accomplish an internship and I planned to go to Gobelins l'Ã©cole de l'image. So I made my first real portfolio. I created this website completely by myself and from scratch from design to back-end.

sections.title: Design
sections.text: It was important for me that the website represented my profile at the time. And as I was into motion design, I tried to bring some elements from this world into the design. It was also meaningful for me to make it animated.

sections.title: Development
sections.text: As I said above, I created this website from scratch. The frontend is vanilla javascript with typescript and Canvas 2D. The backend is a hand made MVC pattern in PHP, with Alto Router and Twig templater.
